resources.string: With this programm you can speed up your device and improve powersaving!\n

1) Make system and data backups using custom recovery (if you can make it)\n 2) Make build.prop file and init.d folder backups using utility, which presents in this programm\n 3)You must understand that tweaks should be installed with the mind, because many installed tweaks can cause conflicts!
Understand, that you solely responsible for any damage device!

If button "CALIBRATE" not active, verify the implementation of both the calibration terms (100% battery level and connected power).

Calibrate process includes deleting files from /data/system/:
- batterystats.bin
- batterystats-daily.xml
- batterystats-checkin.bin
ATTENTION! CALIBRATION MAY DAMAGE THE BATTERY OR THE DEVICE! DO ONLY AT YOUR OWN RISK

You can make battery calibration only if you have problems with low energy efficiency devices without objective reasons (e.g., battery swelling), incorrectly shows the battery level. Also you can make calibrate when you reinstalled ROM on your device. 
Please do not make battery calibration just like that, because you can damage your device or battery

But if you do decide to do the calibration (of course, at your own risk), follow the instructions below:
1) Fully charge your device
2) Without stopping to charge the device, perform the calibration by pressing the appropriate button below.

It is recommended to reboot now. 

Do you want to reboot your device?
Please note, that the dates are updated only after the page is refreshing. That is, if you did backup - refresh the page and the date is set to the correct!
You can found backup files in: /sdcard/SystemTweakerFREE/backups
This section contains tweaks that can help you increase the battery life of the device.\n
Google Services tweak\nFixes overuse battery of Google services
Increase WiFi autoscan time\nThis tweak improves powersaving
Enable Power Collapse\nThis option allows system to go into a deep sleep when the screen is off
Enable better management of sensors during deepsleep
This section contains tweaks that can help you increase the speed and stability of internet.\n
Internet Tweaks\nImproving WiFi/3G/2G/4G tweaks, increasing download speed, improving stability
Improving internet speed\nChanging the TCP an other values for the better
Fast Dormancy\nEnabling this feature can increase the speed of the internet, but also reduce powersaving
These tweaks may not work on all devices!\n
This section includes the different other tweaks\n
Remove adb debug icon from statusbar

On this page you can send an email to the developer. I can help you if you have problems or questions \n\nTo contact me, please write your message in the field "Text of message" and then click "Send". Your device prompts you to select the mail application to send a message, select the application, send me an email. If you have not e-mail app on your device, you can contact me with this e-mail: NowenUI@bk.ru
The message can not be sent, no installed e-mail clients.
This program allows you to customize your device, will help to get the maximum performance and help to increase the battery life of your device\n

Used libraries: 
- RootTools by Stericson
- RootShell by Stericson
- android-gif-drawable
- EasyDeviceInfo by nisrulz
- AndroidDeviceNames by jaredrummler 
- DeviceInformation by akexorcist
- No-frills CPU Control CLASSIC open-source project
- Spinner2 by scijoker
- Snackbar by mrengineer13

Before using the program, you should read agreement

 1) Program developer is not responsible for unpredictable results using the program

 2) Yes, you should understand that developer not responsible for the broken devices, dead batteries, etc

 3) All the features of the program is for information only, their presence does not mean their using

 4) You can not use the program for their own purposes, or any part of the code of the program without the consent of the developer, but bear in mind paragraph 5

 5) All of the features, presented in the program (tweaks, battery calibration technology, speed-up technology with one click and etc.), are available to the public, you can use them for their own purposes (for example, commercial purposes)
This section contains tweaks that can be used to increase the stability and speed of the system and customize it\n
Force home launcher into memory (use light launchers only)\nUse only if your phone have many free RAM
Render UI with GPU, improving smooth of scrolling\nEnabling this tweak may improve performance and smooth, but only if your GPU is powerful
Improving smooth and speed of scrolling
Auto-zipalign every boot and every week\nThis tweak improving speed and performance of your phone
Auto optimize SQLite every boot and every week\nThis tweak improving speed and performance of your phone
FSTRIM- special utility that accelerates the operation of the device by performing the TRIM operation on the memory device\n
Button status is updated only after reloading the page

MediaServer - it is a system service that scans the external memory (if available), and the internal memory of the presence of media. Please make service shutdown only when you have problems with performance or powersave.
Disable MediaServer on boot (init.d support is required)
Disable MediaScanner on boot (init.d support is required)
This section contains tweaks that can be used to improve photo and video quality\n
Improving the quality of the photo shoot and video up to 100%
Increase the quality of receive and transmit speech in mobile networks by including AMR WIDEBAND functions
Please click BACK again to exit
On this page you can shutdown or reboot your device in the selected by you mode\n
Are you sure want to turn off your device?)
Are you sure want to make hot reboot?)
Are you sure want to reboot info recovery?)
Are you sure want to reboot info bootloader?)
Improve display quality\nImplemented by the system display calibration
Root, busybox and init.d support are needed!
Are you sure want to fully reboot your device?)

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 

net.tcp.buffersize.default=4096,87380,256960,4096,16384,256960

net.tcp.buffersize.wifi=4096,87380,256960,4096,16384,256960

net.tcp.buffersize.umts=4096,87380,256960,4096,16384,25696

net.tcp.buffersize.gprs=4096,87380,256960,4096,16384,256960 

net.tcp.buffersize.edge=4096,87380,256960,4096,16384,256960 

net.tcp.buffersize.hspa=6144,87380,524288,6144,163 84,262144 

net.tcp.buffersize.lte=524288,1048576,2097152,5242 88,1048576,2097152 

net.tcp.buffersize.hsdpa=6144,87380,1048576,6144,8 7380,1048576 

net.tcp.buffersize.evdo_b=6144,87380,1048576,6144, 87380,1048576 ]

This item allows you to increase the speed and stability of the internet through the applying of enhanced buffers

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

ro.ril.hsxpa=2


ro.ril.hep=1


ro.ril.enable.dtm=1


ro.ril.hsdpa.category=10


ro.ril.enable.a53=1


ro.ril.enable.3g.prefix=1


ro.ril.gprsclass=10


ro.ril.hsupa.category=7


ro.ril.hsdpa.category=10


ro.ril.enable.a52=1


ro.ril.set.mtu1472=1


persist.cust.tel.eons=1

INIT.D TWEAK: 05InternetTweak.

CONTAINS:

echo "0" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_timestamps;


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_tw_reuse;


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_sack;


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_tw_recycle;


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_window_scaling;


echo "5" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_keepalive_probes;


echo "30" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_keepalive_intvl;


echo "30" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_fin_timeout;


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_dsack


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp_moderate_rcvbuf


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/icmp_echo_ignore_all


echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ]

It allows you to configure the current TCP mode by optimal settings for all devices and apply build.prop special tweaks for improved performance 3G and 4G!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 
net.dns2=8.8.4.4 

net.rmnet0.dns1=8.8.8.8 

net.rmnet0.dns2=8.8.4.4 

net.ppp0.dns1=8.8.8.8 

net.ppp0.dns2=8.8.4.4 

net.wlan0.dns1=8.8.8.8 

net.wlan0.dns2=8.8.4.4 

net.eth0.dns1=8.8.8.8 

net.eth0.dns2=8.8.4.4 

net.gprs.dns1=8.8.8.8 

net.gprs.dns2=8.8.4.4 ]

It applies the following DNS servers: 8.8.8.8 и 8.8.4.4. It allows you to increase the speed of opening web pages and improve the stability!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 
ro.config.hw_fast_dormancy=1]

This tweak enabling Fast Dormancy! If the operator's network supports it, then (theoretically) it saves your battery and smaller loads operator's towers. But if the network operator does not support or supports incorrectly, the battery is not saves, plus there may be problems with data transmission

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 
persist.telephony.support.ipv6=1]

Force enable IPv6 data communication protocol

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 
persist.telephony.support.ipv4=1]

Force enable IPv data communication protocol

[INIT.D TWEAK: 05FixGoogleServicedrain

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

Tweek allows you to increase the battery lifetime by adjusting the individual settings for delayed "dirty" buffers VM.

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
wifi.supplicant_scan_interval=220 ] 

Tweek allows you to increase the battery lifetime by increasing the interval of auto scan Wifi networks (to 220 ms). Note that auto-connect to the saved Wifi networks in the background may be a little longer.

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.ril.disable.power.collapse=0

ro.vold.umsdirtyratio=20

pm.sleep_mode=1 ] 

Tweek allows you to increase the battery lifetime by enabling Power Collapse mode and setting the sleep mode.

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
power_supply.wakeup=enable ] 

Tweek allows you to increase the battery lifetime by activate controls and to prevent sifting device technology Power Supply. 

ATTENTION! You may have problems with background music playback (but not only) when the screen off!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.ril.sensor.sleep.control=1 ] 

Tweek allows you to increase the battery lifetime by enable sleep mode for device sensors, when the device is in sleep

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.config.nocheckin=1

profiler.force_disable_err_rpt=1

profiler.force_disable_ulog=1

logcat.live=disable

debugtool.anrhistory=0

profiler.debugmonitor=false

profiler.launch=false

profiler.hung.dumpdobugreport=false

persist.android.strictmode=0

 ] 

Tweak allows you to increase the battery lifetime by disabling background logcats

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.HOME_APP_ADJ=1] 

Tweek allows to fix launcher in memory, eliminating repainting, restart launcher. Use only if your device have RAM> 1GB

[INIT.D TWEAK: display

INCLUDES:

setprop ro.qcom.ad 1 

setprop ro.qcom.ad.calib.data /system/etc/ad_calib.cfg ]

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d. 
Also applying new file ad_calib.cfg, and which contains the display settings] 

Tweek allows you to increase the image quality on the display through the applying of a special screen profile

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.kernel.android.checkjni=0 ] 

Tweek allows you to fix some bugs in applications by disabling their detection

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

debug.composition.type=gpu

debug.sf.hw=1

debug.performance.tuning=1

debug.egl.profiler=1

debug.egl.hw=1

debug.enabletr=true 

debug.overlayui.enable=1 

debug.qctwa.preservebuf=1 

dev.pm.dyn_samplingrate=1 

ro.fb.mode=1 

ro.sf.compbypass.enable=0 

hw3d.force=1 

ro.product.gpu.driver=1 

persist.sampling_profiler=0 

hwui.render_dirty_regions=false 

persist.sys.ui.hw=1 

ro.config.disable.hw_accel=false 

video.accelerate.hw=1 

hwui.disable_vsync=true 

persist.sys.composition.type=gpu

INIT.D TWEAK: 81GPU_rendering

INCLUDES:

sysrw 

rm /system/lib/egl/libGLES_android.so 

busybox sed -i '/0 0 android/d' /system/lib/egl/egl.cfg 

sysro ] 

Tweek allows force using the GPU for rendering operations, this improves the smoothness, improves the quality of the video playing, but can cause battery drain. Use only if your device has a powerful GPU! Otherwise, you may have lags!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAKS:

windowsmgr.max_events_per_sec=150 

ro.min_pointer_dur=8

ro.max.fling_velocity=12000

ro.min.fling_velocity=8000] 

Tweek allows to increase the smoothness of scrolling lists, by setting the corresponding parameter

[INIT.D TWEAK: 93zipalign

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

This tweak optimize applications on every boot, and every week, it will increase the speed of opening and smooth operation of all application

[INIT.D TWEAK: 11sqlite

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

This tweak optimize SQLITE on every boot and each week, this will increase the speed of the system and the applications that use SQLite

[INIT.D TWEAK: ram_balanced, ram_multitasking, ram_gaming (depending on the selected mode)

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

Tweak allows you to optimize memory, depending on the mode selected through the application of optimal parameters MinFree, Debug Values, LowMemoryKiller!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

ro.media.dec.jpeg.memcap=8000000

ro.media.enc.hprof.vid.bps=8000000 ] 

 Tweak sets the maximum threshold of quality shooting photos and videos

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
ro.ril.enable.amr.wideband=1 ] 

This tweak enabling AMR WideBand. E.g improves the quality of the transmitted and received voice during a call, e.g removes the noise. It may not be supported by all operators!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

media.stagefright.enable-player=true

media.stagefright.enable-meta=true

media.stagefright.enable-scan=true

media.stagefright.enable-http=true

media.stagefright.enable-rtsp=true

media.stagefright.enable-record=false ] 

Tweak allows to increase the quality of streaming video by incorporating various parameters StageFright

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

ro.media.capture.flash=led

ro.media.capture.flashMinV=3300000

ro.media.capture.torchIntensity=65

ro.media.capture.flashIntensity=100 ] 

Tweak directly affects the parameters of the flash module. In this case- it increases the intensity and minimum illumination threshold (flash- sets the intensity of the 100, and for flashlight - 65)

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
persist.adb.notify=0 ] 

Tweak removes ADB debug icon from statusbar

[INIT.D TWEAK: quick_power
\INCLUDES:

setprop ro.config.hw_quickpoweron true

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

This tweak speeding up system boot!

[ТВИК BUILD.PROP:

dalvik.vm.dex2oat-filter=speed

dalvik.vm.image-dex2oat-filter=speed ] 

Tweak increase system and applications speed by changing the dex2oat mode , also on your device will no longer disappear memory, and it is possible to reduce the time to optimize the application after cleaning caches!
Dalvik cache will be cleared. Continue?

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK: 

persist.sys.use_dithering=0 

persist.sys.use_16bpp_alpha=1 

persist.service.lgospd.enable=0

persist.service.pcsync.enable=0

 touch.pressure.scale=0.001

 

INIT.D :TWEAK BOOST

INCLUDES: 

busybox sysctl -w vm.drop_caches=3 

busybox sysctl -w vm.dirty_ratio = 1 

busybox sysctl -w vm.dirty_background_ratio = 1

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

Tweak improves system speed by disabling Dithering, improving scroling speed (Fling Velocity) and etc.
Tweak applied and we cleared Dalvik cache\n\nReboot device required!
Tweak disabled and we cleared Dalvik cache\n\nReboot device required!

[INIT.D TWEAK touch

INCLUDES: 

echo 7025 > /sys/class/touch/switch/set_touchscreen

echo 8002 > /sys/class/touch/switch/set_touchscreen

echo 11001 > /sys/class/touch/switch/set_touchscreen

echo 13030 > /sys/class/touch/switch/set_touchscreen

echo 14005 > /sys/class/touch/switch/set_touchscreen

If you apply this tweak, it will be located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

Enabling this feauture can improve touchscreen speed and quality
Successful!We recommend to reboot your device!
On this page you can directly report a bug or suggest an idea !
Message Text (a detailed description of the problem and suggestions):

[INIT.D TWEAK: 00BatteryImprove

INCLUDES:

echo "500" > /proc/sys/vm/dirty_expire_centisecs 

echo "1000" > /proc/sys/vm/dirty_writeback_centisecs

If you apply this tweak, file located in /system/etc/init.d ] 

Tweak allows you to increase the battery lifetime by adjusting the individual settings for "dirty" buffers VM.

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:
persist.sys.force_highendgfx=true] 

Tweak improves visual effects when LOW RAM mode is on!

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

dalvik.vm.heapsize={} 

dalvik.vm.heaptargetutilization=0.75 

dalvik.vm.heapgrowthlimit={}

dalvik.vm.check-dex-sum=false

dalvik.vm.checkjni=false

 dalvik.vm.execution-mode=jit] 

Tweek increases system performance and applications through the use of HEAP-SIZE optimal values for your device. Various tweaks runtime also performed, namely disconnected various scan settings, the JIT mode is activated forcibly. ATTENTION! DANGEROUS TWEAK! On some devices, you may receive various problems! Use with caution!
Android 7.X.X TWEAKS\nImprove performance through applying optimized JIT values

[BUILD.PROP TWEAK:

dalvik.vm.jitthreshold=15000 

dalvik.vm.usejitprofiles=true 

dalvik.vm.jitprithreadweight=750

dalvik.vm.jittransitionweight=1500] 

Tweak improves system performance and stability through applying optimized JIT values (working only on Android 7.X)
Recommended for use once a week!
After applying tweaks to full working please reboot your device!
It is recommended to reboot now.\n\nDo you want to restart your device?
